message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the time invested in its creation. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, potentially saving you time and resources in the long run. Would you like to explore this opportunity further?

Thank you for offering the premium product. I appreciate the value you place on it. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a lower price of $12000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations and appreciate your interest in our premium product. In light of your proposal, I would like to extend an alternative offer. While we cannot match the exact $12000 you've suggested, we're willing to negotiate closer to our original valuation. Therefore, I'm proposing a price of $14000 for the product. This still represents a significant discount from our initial asking price, while allowing us to maintain a fair value for our product. I hope this proposal will be more agreeable and look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for considering my budget. I appreciate the negotiation effort. Based on your offer, I would like to propose a price of $13500 for the product. I hope this suggestion will be within the range you're comfortable with.
